TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
I am afraid that I must ask for your help once again.
I am afraid that I must ask for your help once again.
I am afraid that I must ask for your help once again.
I am afraid that I must ask for your help once again.
If it will aid me in my quest to find out who is controlling these Orcs, then I'm glad to be of service.
If it will aid me in my quest to find out who is controlling these Orcs, then I'm glad to be of service.

It may help indirectly.
It may help indirectly.
It may help indirectly.
It may help indirectly.
What do you mean, 'indirectly'?
What do you mean, 'indirectly'?
What do you mean, 'indirectly'?
What do you mean, 'indirectly'?
Gruulkar has been stirring trouble with the Ogres in the south. We are afraid that he is getting them ready to attack us here in Dhun-Kor.
Gruulkar has been stirring trouble with the Ogres in the south. We are afraid that he is getting them ready to attack us here in Dhun-Kor.

How will solving your Ogre problem help me find what I'm looking for?
How will solving your Ogre problem help me find what I'm looking for?
How will solving your Ogre problem help me find what I'm looking for?
How will solving your Ogre problem help me find what I'm looking for?
Actually, it might not. But ignoring these Ogres will hinder you if they decide to march north. Best to travel south and stop them now.
Actually, it might not. But ignoring these Ogres will hinder you if they decide to march north. Best to travel south and stop them now.

That makes sense. I'll take care of it.
